los.title: TSSG
los.objectives: An exploration of the world of Data Science in the context of the Internet of Things.

los.title: Distilled
los.objectives: The leader in online marketplaces in Ireland, including donedeal, daft and adverts. Maeve Carey, Head of Biz Ops

los.title: Dataworks
los.objectives: Providing software solutions and validation services to clients in the Life Sciences Sector focusing on the Digital Transformation. Brian Robinson, CTO

los.title: Fundrecs
los.objectives: Reconciliation software for the Global Funds Industry, European Startup of the Year 2016, Padraig O'Scanaill, Director/Founder

los.title: ServiceBot
los.objectives: Providing a Conversational Artificial Intelligence (AI) Platform for businesses to build natural language solutions. John Rellis, Team Lead

los.title: Sunlife
los.objectives: A leading global financial services organisation, provide a diverse range of wealth accumulation and insurance products. Shane McCormack, Director of Application Development

los.title: SE2
los.objectives: A recognized leader and one of the most innovative technology and third party administration companies in the annuity insurance industry. Ian McGoldrick, Solution Architect

los.title: Microchip
los.objectives: Semiconductor and system solutions across the microcontroller, analog, FPGA, connectivity and power management markets. Anton Krug, Embedded Development Engineer

los.title: Scuri
los.objectives: Delivering a dynamic platform & API designed for connecting & optimising online ordering, shipping and delivery. Rory O’Connor, CEO

los.title: VR Education
los.objectives: A multi-award winning virtual/augmented reality (VR/AR) software firm dedicated to changing how educational content and corporate training are provided and consumed globally. Jonathan McDonald, CTO
